snippet.title: James' Fun House: Episode 1 [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
Trailer for the long awaited, 5 years in the making, 13-Map Doom 2 Total Conversion.

Synopsis: Play as the surviving member of an elite strike team employed by the Japanese Americans Against Anime (J.A.A.A). Infiltrate the stronghold(Fun House) of James (The Dark Messiah of Anime), eliminate his followers, rescue hostages, and find proof of his plans to create real life anime.

Fight your way through the First 13 levels of The Fun House. Battle cyborg anime cultists, otaku ninjas, fascist ogres, and alien space pirates, ending with a final confrontation against the Frontline Morale Destroyer (The weapon to surpass Metal Gear).

Zdoom Page (Contains Download. Requires GZDOOM V4.10.0): https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?t=78454

Music Used:

Joe Hisashi - Act of Violence

Gun Dog - Chair (Instrumental)
